name: A Moment In Tme
description:
The target is removed from the standard
passage of time. Choose if they return
instantly or within the temporal range.
Then choose if their experience is instan-
taneous or up to the temporal range.
If their experience is not instantaneous,
the target has that time for themselves
while witnessing time move relatively
for others. The target may move around
freely, yet interacting with another being
or object not on their person instantly
ends the spell.
When returning, the target appears in
the unoccupied space nearest to their
departure location.
